tool_description: Incorporate the world’s best free stock photos and videos into your own app or website
name: Pexels
title: Pexels

api_list.name: Search for Photos
api_list.description: This endpoint returns photos based on your provided search query.

api_list.name: Search for Videos
api_list.description: Search for free videos on Pexels with this API endpoint.

api_list.name: Curated Photos
api_list.description: Get a list of curated photos with this API endpoint

api_list.name: Popular Videos
api_list.description: Get a list of popular videos with this API endpoint

api_list.name: Get a Photo by ID
api_list.description: This API endpoint returns a photo object
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://PexelsdimasV1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/photos/5683489"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "PexelsdimasV1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://PexelsdimasV1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/photos/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "PexelsdimasV1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get a Video by ID

import requests
